entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Ice pellets. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to rain or periods of drizzle near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
